buttonLatched.title: Button latched
buttonLatched.description: Is true if the button has been pressed in the last 24 hours

isButtonPressed.title: Is button pressed
isButtonPressed.description: Is true if the button is pressed right now

removedFromDial.title: Removed from dial
removedFromDial.description: True = removed from dial, False = installed on dial

highLPG.title: High level of LPG detected
highLPG.description: Is true if there is high level of LPG detected

lowLPG.title: Low level of LPG detected
lowLPG.description: Is true if there is low level of LPG detected

outOfRange.title: Out of range error
outOfRange.description: Is true if an out of range error is detected

notValidReadout.title: Not a valid readout
notValidReadout.description: Is true if the sensor is inoperational
